comment.author: 79037172@N04
comment._content: Wife was Mabel (not Mebel) Naylor, of 33, Cambridge Gardens, Bramley, Leeds.

comment.author: 77235581@N00
comment._content: His CWGC entry can be found here

comment.author: 64288588@N05
comment._content:
Born 1892 at Meanwood in Leeds. He was the son of Simeon and Elizabeth Naylor. In 1911 he was living with his aunt and uncle on Wood Lane in Bramley and he was described as a Trimmer in a Tailor Shop.
He married Mabel Duckworth on 16th Jan 1915 at St Peter's Church, Bramley.
